channel.title: Doron Tal on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Doron Tal on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: When Robots Can Write
item.description: Today in Tedium: It seems like a constant refrain of the internet eraâ€“the robots are coming to steal our jobs, and they’re getting better by the day. So far, that has mostly meant that heavy industrial jobs have become increasingly automated and restaurants in San Francisco are basically making food without the added work of human hands. (And hey, if you think about it, vending machines are a very basic form of automation.
